summary: The diff implements all five requirements (REQ-38 through REQ-42) for fixing the blank page rendering issue. An ErrorBoundary component was added with bilingual error messages, App.tsx was updated to properly configure TanStack Router with QueryClientProvider wrapping, HomePage.tsx was enhanced with Suspense boundaries for all section components, AdminDashboard.tsx includes actor initialization loading states, and all components are properly structured to prevent rendering failures.
